articles.title: Tata Steel Q4 update: India production up 5.1% at 5.15 mt, Europe delivery volume down 11.3% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: For the entire FY23, Tata Steel India''s production value came in at 19.87 mt, which is higher as compared to 19.06 mt in FY22.
articles.content: Tata Steel's production volume in India jumped by 5.1 percent on-year to 5.15 million tonnes in the fourth quarter of fiscal year 2022-23, as per the provisional data shared by the steelmaker on Apri… [+1604 chars]

articles.author: George Dvorsky
articles.title: What to Know About the JUICE Mission to Jupiter and Its Frozen Moons - Gizmodo
articles.description: Europe's JUICE probe will investigate three of Jupiter's largest ice moons for signs of potential habitability.
articles.content: More than a decade after the mission was announced, JUICE is finally ready for its much-anticipated journey to Jupiter. Packed with 10 instruments, its one of the most advanced probes ever sent to th… [+615 chars]
